definition: lightning/electricity/electric (bound form)/to get (or give) an electric shock/phone call or telegram etc/to send via telephone or telegram etc
ice/CL:塊|块[kuai4]/to chill sth/(of an object or substance) to feel cold/(of a person) cold/unfriendly/(slang) methamphetamine

sentences.english: Cold is defensed by the stove.
The refrigerator doesn't get cool enough.
If you buy a refrigerator, we will throw in a microwave oven.
sentences.chinese: 如果你買一臺電冰箱，我們免費贈送一臺微波爐。

sentences.english: Thank you for your quotation for the refrigerators.
sentences.chinese: 感謝你方寄來的電冰箱報價函。

sentences.english: Consider passing on old freezers and refrigerators.
sentences.chinese: 在遇到舊的電冰箱或冰櫃時，考慮不買。

sentences.english: There is some meat in the freezer and we are not caught short.
sentences.chinese: 電冰箱裏有肉，我們就不會急需時作難了。

sentences.english: The refrigerator is reasonable in price.
In summer,foods are usually kept in refrigerators.
sentences.chinese: 在夏天，食物通常被放在電冰箱裏。

sentences.english: The utility model relates to a changing device for a door shaft of a refrigerator door.
sentences.chinese: 本實用新型涉及一種電冰箱箱門門軸轉換裝置。

sentences.english: The "Shanghai" refrigerator is a first-rate brand, and its quality is guaranteed.
sentences.chinese: 上海牌電冰箱，一流名牌，質量保證。
第一，電冰箱的生產數額是14，500臺。

sentences.english: Today, 70 percent have refrigerators in their homes. They have microwaves, rice cookers.
sentences.chinese: 如今，中國70%的人都有電冰箱，微波爐，電飯鍋。

sentences.english: This summer, Tim, we also have a refrigerator.
sentences.chinese: 今年夏天，我們家還添了電冰箱。

sentences.english: Letters have been pouring into the office complaining about this kind of refrigerator.
sentences.chinese: 辦公室連續收到大批信件抱怨這種電冰箱。

sentences.english: This refrigerator is fabricated from parts made in different factories.
sentences.chinese: 這臺電冰箱是由不同的工廠所制的零件組裝的。

definition: to cut ties/to disconnect/out of touch
